root: ^What the fuck? Were you just going through my stuff?

c-0: ^Strange... I thought I saw you snooping through my things. Are you lying to me?
^Why? I've got some personal stuff in there that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you.
^Because I thought it would be fun.
^I guess I can appreciate the honesty... Did you even find anything of interest?
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Your attitude is starting to piss me off.
c-2: ^Because it's common sense to not snoop around in other peoples business? I mean, I'd probably do the same but... Did you even find anything of interest?

c-1: ^And yet your eyes are saying something completely different. So... Care to tell me if you're lying?
^Why, would you care if I did?

c-0: ^Well, I guess I'll have to take your word on it. Just remember, if you lie, I'll stab you. Kidding. Or am I?
c-1: ^I guess I can appreciate the honesty... Did you even find anything of interest?
c-2: ^Because it's common sense to not snoop around in other peoples business? Not that I have any common sense, but your attitude is starting to piss me off.
^Ouch. I've got some personal stuff in here that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you. Well let's be honest, I probably wouldn't.

c-0: ^Oh, did you now? Suddenly, this is Intriguing. Let's see if I can scare you away. What did you find?
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Accept that not everyone is like that. It's fucking rude.
c-2: ^Has to be the funniest joke I've heard in years. Not. I feel like I'm witnessing the show flops in Baby Reindeer.

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care.
c-1: ^Thanks! And I don't even have to try. I honestly don't care what you think about me.
^Sorry not sorry. That also didn't answer my question. Did you look through my stuff?
^I didn't know it would piss you off.

c-0: ^Calm down? Don't you fucking talk to me like that. I've got some personal stuff in there that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you.
^It's our second date?! Why would I tell you my darkest secrets when I don't even know you yet? Why do you get to know more about me but I don't get to know anything about you? That's just unfair.
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Accept that not everyone is like that. It's fucking rude.
c-2: ^Because it's common sense to not snoop around in other peoples business? I invited you here and you disrespect me like this. It's fucking rude.

c-1: ^Well then you clearly don't know me. I've got some personal stuff in there that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you.
^Look, I'm sorry. I don't want to fight about this.

c-0: ^It's our second date?! Why would I tell you my darkest secrets when I don't even know you yet? Why do you get to know more about me but I don't get to know anything about you? That's just unfair.
c-1: ^Well then maybe you should've thought twice before you snooped through my stuff. And here I was excited for us to watch a horror movie together.
c-2: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Accept that not everyone is like that. It's fucking rude.
^Ouch. I've got some personal stuff in here that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you. Well let's be honest, I probably wouldn't.

c-2: ^Has to be the funniest joke I've heard in years. Not. I feel like I'm witnessing the show flops in Baby Reindeer.

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care.
c-1: ^Aww, thank you! That means a lot. And I don't even have to try. To be honest, I don't care what you think about me.

c-2: ^Ouch. I've got some personal stuff in here that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you. Well let's be honest, I probably wouldn't.

c-0: ^Oh, did you now? Suddenly, this is Intriguing. Let's see if I can scare you away. What did you find?
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Accept that not everyone is like that. It's fucking rude.
c-2: ^Has to be the funniest joke I've heard in years. Not. I feel like I'm witnessing the show flops in Baby Reindeer.

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care.
c-1: ^Thanks! And I don't even have to try. I honestly don't care what you think about me.

ARGUING: ^Why do you always have to be so rude?
^It was nothing special, just rotted in bed.
^It was good, hung out with my dog all day!

c-0: ^I would've payed to see that. Is that all it takes to get you on a bad mood? Then we definitely have something in common, altough it would probably take less for me. Like just a person walking reeeeeeeally slowly in front of me. Pisses me off.
^Oh. I guess I was just born depressed or something, sad straight out of the womb you know. So I can't really relate to that. What's that like?
c-1: ^Yeah? You should see me behind the wheel. The road rage is unhinged. I could probably win an award for angriest driver alive. Young men behind the wheel should be castrated.

c-0: ^Hang them in the town square! By the balls!

c-2: ^That seems right, not a single thought behind those eyes. Maybe you don't have any brain cells? It's just all parasites slowly eating you from the inside. Parasites are probably made out of cells though, but you know.
^You're funny, I'll give that to you.

c-1: ^Rotting is underrated. I like to pretend that I'm a decaying corpse when I lay in bed sometimes. There's something weirdly comforting about that. Just wasting away, you know.
^I'd love to be a decaying corpse.
^If you're a corpse, I'm a corpse.

c-0: ^You mean that you wouldn't want to slowly become one with the bed? And not having to worry about anything in your life ever again? Your loss.
c-1: ^Just slowly become one with the bed and not having to worry about anything in your life ever again. Like rent. Or cleaning. Or your childhood traumas.
c-2: ^Let's not get all lovey dovey here. You barely know me, or the skeletons in my closet. Literally.
^Oh, you have a dog? Even if I'm obviously a cat person, I love dogs. I don't really care for humans that much, but animals are the only good part of this world.

c-0: ^I think hanging out with an animal has always been like an escape for me, ever since I was a kid. It's this kind of unconditional love that you can't really find in any other being, at least if your parents are like mine.
c-1: ^That must be the most stupid thing I've heard in the two decades that I've been alive. I think we should just all stop reproducing, and walk hand in hand into extinction. Just like Rust said in True Detective you know?

c-0: ^Dude. You've got some learning to do.

c-2: ^I think hanging out with an animal has always been like an escape for me, ever since I was a kid. It's this kind of unconditional love that you can't really find in any other being, at least if your parents are like mine.

STUFF: ^Why do you have a voodoo doll?

c-0: ^Oh, that old thing? It's just something I like to do when I'm bored. I've been trying to summon the devil for a while, and look, here you are!
^Oh, scared, are you? I promise he doesn't bite
c-1: ^Have you forgotten who you're on a date with? Are you suffering from early dementia? Poor thing. I just have some unfinished business with him that I'd like to discuss.

c-0: ^Hang them in the town square! By the balls!

c-2: ^That seems right, not a single thought behind those eyes. Maybe you don't have any brain cells? It's just all parasites slowly eating you from the inside. Parasites are probably made out of cells though, but you know.
^You're funny, I'll give that to you.

^Oh, that old thing? That's my best friend. Don't worry, I've totally used it on you.
^That's why I've felt a stabbing pain all week.

c-0: ^I think hanging out with an animal has always been like an escape for me, ever since I was a kid. It's this kind of unconditional love that you can't really find in any other being, at least if your parents are like mine.
c-1: ^That must be the most stupid thing I've heard in the two decades that I've been alive. I think we should just all stop reproducing, and walk hand in hand into extinction. Just like Rust said in True Detective you know?

c-0: ^Dude. You've got some learning to do.

c-2: ^Oh, don't feel special. I wouldn't use it on a useless mortal such as yourself.

CIGARETTES: ^FUCK! Sorry for cutting you off. I just realized that I forgot to buy cigarettes. I know. Probably a turn off, right? But what can I do, everyone in my band smokes like Snoop Dogg. I don't do the weed though, only on special occasions.

c-0: ^You do? I'll buy two packs then. And we can smoke the night away, just like Satan intended us to. I'll be right back, and don't do anything weird to Lucifer!
c-1: ^So? That's kind of the point. We're all slowly dying anyway, so I'm just trying to make the road there shorter. Anyway, I'll be right back, and don't do anything weird to Lucifer!
c-2: ^Didn't know I needed your permission, but note taken I guess. You will walk out of here smelling like death, and that's kind of the point. Anyway, I'll be right back, and don't do anything weird to Lucifer!
